body.name: PEIOUS Wireless Mouse, Jiggler Mouse for Laptop - LED Mouse Rechargeable Computer Mice Mouse Mover Undetectable Random Movement with On/Off Button Keeps Computer Awake - Black&Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 27 mins
features: Mouse Jiggler & Rechargeable LED Mouse 2 in 1 Design -- If you are doing your work on the computer, this would be a actual mouse with amazing LED colors, if you're not typing away or step away from your computer, this would be a Mouse mover which give you a little breathing room without having to worry about logging back into all your programs again(You will have to press the DPI button for 3 seconds to enter into jiggler mode)

Random Movements & No Interfere with using Mouse -- The mouse produces random movements on the screen and it is very quiet in Jiggler Mode, when you back to the computer, no need to draw attention to the fact that you're using a jiggler, the cursor is under your control! It will enter Jiggler mode again after 5 seconds of inactivity

Plug & Play Perfect for Laptops Only with Limited USB Port -- There is virtually no set up, you literally just plug it in and turn on the switch it works! Only 1 real mouse will be plugged in your computer, so no worries if you use using it with your laptop that only has 1 or 2 USB ports, and not bother to buy an adapter

Separate On/Off Control for the Mouse and Jiggler Mode -- It serves its purpose and can be turned on and off, gives you simple and effective control, so you don’t have to plug it in and unplug it, cause not all the time you will need to run it

Universal Compatibility & Risk Free 12 Months Warranty -- Compatible with almost all USB-enabled Computers run of Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Mac OS. And this mouse is backed by 12-months warranty, just let us know if you have any issues with the mouse ordered.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: LED Mouse, Wireless Mouse with Jiggler Function

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to Use the Jiggler Press the DPI button for 3 seconds, the green light on;Mouse entering into “Jiggler Mouse” mode, enjoy the “Jiggler”, no more screen sleepingPress the DPI button for 3 seconds again to exit “Mouse Mover” mode Universal Mouse Jiggler If you're tired of constantly logging back in due to your computer signing out after a few minutes of inactivity, this mouse with Jiggler is the solution. With this feature, your PC will stay logged in all day until you're ready to turn it off. If you work from home, this is definitely a must-have!

4-Level DPI Settings With high sensor and offers 4 levels of adjustable DPI: 800-1200-1600-2000. This allows you to select the desired sensitivity for your daily needs. Quiet Wireless Mouse Rreduces noise by up to 90%, making it ideal for homeschooling or stay-at-home working users who want to minimize disturbance to others Rechargeable Mouse This mouse is equipped with a built-in 650mAh rechargeable battery, providing up to 1-2 month of usage on a single charge (with the LED lights off) Plug & Play Easy Control The USB receiver slot is located on the back, allowing for convenient storage. There is an on/off power switch that enables easy control

Pls Kindly Note: > The jiggler mouse is designed to keep your PC active without interfering with its use. While in "Mouse Jiggler" mode, you can control the mouse cursor as usual. If there is no movement of the mouse for 5 seconds, it will automatically return to the jiggler mode to continue keeping your PC active; > In "Mouse Jiggler" mode, the cursor will continue moving even if the mouse enters deep sleep mode. To exit this mode, press and hold the DPI button for 3 seconds; > After 90 seconds of inactivity, the mouse will enter sleep mode, and the LED backlit will turn off. To wake it up, simply click any button; > If there is 8 minutes of inactivity, the mouse will go into deep sleep mode, and all LED indicators will turn off. Again, clicking any button will wake it up; > If you experience mouse lag or the backlit turns off automatically, it may indicate low battery. Please recharge the mouse, and the RGB backlit will flash red to indicate low battery status.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: In the digital age, where personal security and uninterrupted workflow are paramount, I have found the perfect companion in the PEIOUS Wireless Mouse. Designed specifically for laptops, this innovative Jiggler Mouse offers undetectable random movements that efficiently keep your computer awake, ensuring optimal productivity and enhanced data security. With its sleek black & grey design and rechargeable battery, this mouse not only delivers on functionality but also adds a touch of style to your workspace.Efficient Movement and Security:One of the standout features of the PEIOUS Wireless Mouse is its ability to provide undetectable random movements. This ingenious technology ensures your laptop remains active, preventing it from going into sleep mode or prompting screen lockouts during long periods of inactivity. This not only eliminates any disruption in workflow but also safeguards your system from unauthorized access when you step away.Wireless Connectivity and Rechargeable Battery:Thanks to the wireless connectivity, I now enjoy a clutter-free workspace. The mouse pairs effortlessly with my laptop, offering a reliable and responsive connection. Gone are the days of frustrating tangled cables! The built-in rechargeable battery eliminates the need for constant battery replacements. I appreciate the convenience of simply connecting the mouse to my laptop's USB port and enjoying extended usage on a single charge.User-Friendly Design and Ergonomics:The PEIOUS Wireless Mouse blends style and functionality seamlessly. The sleek black and grey color scheme exudes professionalism, complementing any laptop or desktop setup. Its ergonomic design fits comfortably in my hand, reducing strain during extended use. The responsive scroll wheel and click buttons provide a satisfying tactile experience, allowing for precise navigation and control.On/Off Button and LED Indicator:For complete control over power usage, this wireless mouse is equipped with a strategically placed On/Off switch. By simply toggling the switch, I can conserve battery life when not in use or instantly power up the mouse when needed. The LED indicator conveniently lets me know whether the mouse is connected or in sleep mode, eliminating any guesswork.Compatibility and Plug-and-Play:Setting up the PEIOUS Wireless Mouse couldn't be easier. It effortlessly connects with any laptop or desktop via the USB receiver, allowing for instant plug-and-play functionality. Additionally, it is compatible with various operating systems, making it a versatile choice for users across different platforms.Pros:1. Undetectable random movements keep your laptop awake for uninterrupted productivity.2. Wireless connectivity provides a clutter-free workspace.3. Rechargeable battery eliminates the need for frequent replacements.4. Ergonomic design ensures optimal comfort during prolonged use.5. Sleek black & grey design adds a touch of style to your workspace.6. On/Off button for convenient power control.7. LED indicator displays the status of the mouse at a glance.8. Easy installation and compatibility with various operating systems.Cons:1. May require occasional reconnection for seamless functioning.Conclusion:If you're looking to enhance productivity, safeguard your data, and enjoy a clutter-free workspace, the PEIOUS Wireless Mouse - Jiggler Mouse for Laptop is an excellent investment. Its undetectable random movements keep your computer active, preventing interruptions during long periods of inactivity. The wireless connectivity, ergonomic design, and rechargeable battery further amplify the user experience. Whether for professional or personal use, this mouse delivers on both functionality and style. Elevate your workflow and security with the PEIOUS Wireless Mouse in your arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had one of these for about a year and it did the job very well for leaving the juggler function on intermittentantly. I expected perhaps a lengthy life span but I proceeded to buy another since I was so satisfied with it from previous use!The color combinations are awesome and fun to watch. It's very smooth and the clicking is super quiet.QIAOYUS's customer service response time is speedy and they were super helpful when discussing concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long charge life
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice mouse. It holds a charge for a long time. The lights are pretty and the mouse works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought It for the Jiggle
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: After less than 3 months of use, the jiggle stopped jiggling. It still works as a regular mouse, but since I purchased this to keep my computer from falling asleep, it's no longer useful to me. I also found the height of the mouse uncomfortable after a few hours. I requested a return and even though the original return window had closed, Amazon authorized the return.I originally bought it for the jiggler function so that my laptop wouldn't fall asleep. It works exactly as advertised and is also comfortable to use. The different light colors are also fun! I haven't used it long enough to determine how long the battery lasts on a full charge. The mouse physically doesn't jiggle, but it keeps the cursor moving when it's in jiggle mode. Happy I purchased this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than Satisfied
reviews.reviewText: After reviewing others review, I was hesitant to buy this mouse jiggler. However I figured if it arrived and was not great or working I can always return it. Well I am so pleased to say this mouse jiggler was one of the best purchases I made through Amazon. The mouse functions well and the jiggler even better. It’s simple to set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase ever
reviews.reviewText: This is a game changer for work. I love the colors and LED light around the bottom that changes colors. Came with rechargeable cord so doesn’t need batteries. It will blink red when it needs to be recharged and you can plug it in and actively use it when charging which I love. Worth the money 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like it; just buy one. The design is nice, the colors are vibrant and it last a while without having to charge it. It does exactly as advertised and looks exactly as the picture too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked, for a while
reviews.reviewText: I have used this mouse for a few months now, and up until about a week ago, all was perfect. The jiggle mode was awesome. But now, it just stops working in the middle of using it. I have to try to jiggle it, turn it on and off, even bang it against my desk. Eventually it starts working again. I have two of these, one is newer, and that one hasn't stopped working like this yet. It is fully charged, so that isn't the problem either. Maybe look in to a different jiggler mouse, or jiggler adapter. It is cheap, so at least I don't feel like it was a complete waste of money.
